yeah I agree

Hai's wrists would have never given out so easily if he lifted, instead he got lazy and started eating less.

in all seriousness though they should change group stage. The best of one format is so unpredictable.
True, but the randomness is what makes it interesting. It gives an underdog team a chance to pull an upset.
